General.Name: Y.C.C. Parts MFG Co Ltd
General.Description: Y.C.C. Parts Mfg. Co., Ltd. manufactures, imports, exports, and trades in automobiles parts in Taiwan, China, and internationally. The company provides bumpers, grilles, head lamp mounting panels, valances, head lamps, and other products. It also engages in the operating and reinvesting related businesses. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Lukang, Taiwan.
